text: 46|20|satyanisedhikal narakattinumumpil pradarsippikkappetunna divasam (avareat parayappetum:) aihikajivitattil ninnalute nalla vastukkalellam ninnal palakkikkalayukayum, ninnal avakeant sukhamanubhavikkukayum ceytu. atinal n'yayam kutate ninnal bhumiyil ahambhavam naticcirunnatinre phalamayum ninnal dhikkaram kaniccirunnatinre phalamayum innu ninnalkk apamanakaramaya siksa pratiphalamayi nalkappetunnu
